GW3008HD: High-End 8 Channel H.264 960H/FD1 DVR with HDMI & VGA. FD1/CIF/960H/Q960H recording, 8ch 960H Full Channels Real-time Playback . iPhone, Android Viewing, PTZ Control

Package Includes: GW3008HD DVR with 2TB HDD; GWLED19IN - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor; 6 x GW807H - 1000 TVL 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Indoor Camera
